data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Gumla, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gumla, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the county of Gumla to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Gumla, Jharkhand, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Gumla to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,001,484 lost people in  Gumla, Jharkhand, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Tamadia people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Gumla.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Gumla, Jharkhand, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Gumla, Jharkhand, India has a population of 1,025,200.

We estimate Gumla has 11,277 people who might know Jesus, 12,439 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,001,484 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Gumla, Jharkhand, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.
